name: Mazu
description:
A lone city stands surrounded by a labyrinth filled with unknown evils. This is the world of MAZU. Explore a fresh and vibrant world to fight mythic monsters in this action adventure rpg inspired by Asian folklore. Play as Xun, an untested youth trying to find a place in the world - and save it too.

Controls(Keyboard/Xbox/PS4)-

Move: WASD/ LJoyStick

Dash: Spacebar/ RB or LB/ R1 or R2

Melee: LMouseClick/ X or B/ Square or Circle

Ranged: RMouseClick/ RJoyStick

Phantom: Shift/ Y/ Triangle

Meditate: Q/ RT/ R2

Interact: Enter/ A/ X
